channel.title: Hugo on Leonidas Simopoulos's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on Leonidas Simopoulos's blog

item.title: Host Hugo on github pages
item.description: This is my first post. I used hugo to make this blog. I totally recommend it. It’s really quick to create a blog without the need to install anything extra(no plugins etc). It took me soIme time to figure out how to host the blog on github pages. I was struggling to deploy the hugo generated static website in github via /docs folder on master branch. It didn’t work. Apparently it does not work having docs folder and hugo code on the same branch.
